doc.title: Dueling for Playmates
doc.plot: What greater fantasy is there than going out on a date with a Playboy playmate? "Dueling for Playmates" gave two male contestants the opportunity to fulfill this ultimate fantasy. The men competed in a series of athletic stunts; watched a video (but of course) of a Playmate and then answered questions about what they had just seen; and performed a strip-tease act that was judged by the guest panel of Playmates. The winner won a date with a Playboy Playmate.
